title: If you had unlimited money and language wasn't an issue what team would you create?
body: So if you had the ability to poach any player from any team with no punishment, unlimited money and everyone knew a common language what team would you create that would win worlds? And if your team lost, you would have to spend the rest of your life at Camp 22 in Korea (Google if you don't know) so you better win.

replies.body: Downvoted for having Dyrus as your only NA player.

Well the reason for that is because I wanted atleast one player from each region, I decided two players from korea because they are the best region after all. I also took in account their play styles. Dyrus is more of a supportive top laner and pretty much always goes even. Dandy and Yellowstar control vision and be huge supportive threats. Faker and Uzi hard carry the game.
Downvoted for not showing NA pride.

> [{quoted}](name=a god damn hero,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=93PeJiEz,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-02-05T21:25:31.321+0000)
>
> Downvoted for not showing NA pride.

NA needs stronger international showing for me to have that pride. They have been doing alot better lately on that front though, so maybe in due time.
You're pathetic if you're a fan of a region just because they're strong.

Didn't say that, and the point of this post is to create a team that you think can win worlds. The only NA players I'd trust on that kind of team are meteos and bjergsen. I'm not gonna be over prideful of NA, when we aren't at the top. I'm not gonna say TSM/C9 best teams in the world, when they clearly aren't. And, why should I be more biased towards a team cuz they're from my region. I want Na to win, but I'm not gonna root for a team just cuz they're na if I like watching and cheering for a team more interesting in another region. I'm not gonna root for Team 8 if MYM is more fun to watch.
